author: Niroopini Muralidharan
text: Holaaa guys ! Me and one of my best friend started this podcast for women's day. We wanted to explore ourselves while discussing issues on a grassroot level .Kindly let us know your views and comments ! (https://t.co/U4wV9PZBvP) https://t.co/ZRrRsNWPQn

author: Niroopini Muralidharan
text: If only women Ruled the world ❤️ we can feel sisterhood , non violence, compassion, selflessness , Humanity and only love 🥰💯 https://t.co/jutXXKebhh

author: Niroopini Muralidharan
text: Today I got an opportunity to Meet Dr. Jean Dreze - Welfare Economist , works on Developmental policies & Gender inequality , also one of the Member from Tamilnadu DMK govt's Economic Advisory council. Amazed by his Humbleness✨ Love the way how he observed every NGO's demands. https://t.co/SrHEhzlL6m
